titles.title: O Oneness Far Beyond (easy familiar words/tune

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O oneness far beyond what words can tell Oneness all human and yet all Divine Oneness which doth all oneneses excel Which cannot be expressed by earthly sign{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}These bodies are the members of the Lord Ours and yet His for use and honor too In sympathy and love and sweet accord So one that nought that oneness can undo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In us that Spirit dwells that dwells in Him The Spirit of the Father and the Son Though poor the temple and the glory dim Still does the Spirit claim it for His own{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O holy oneness between earth and heaven Each is the other and yet not the same Not fellowship alone to us is given But unity of nature and of name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He still the Son of God on yonder throne And we the sons of earth yet dwelling here Yet we with Him He with us truly one As if one heart were ours one home one sphere{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Upon His holy throne these members yet Shall all be seated in that day when He The head of the great unity shall sit With them to share one common royalty{/lang-eng}
